column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I needed to get to work , but my car was not working .
#id=2
#text=I decided to take the public bus .
#id=3
#text=I walked to the bus stop and sat down on the bench that was provided .
#id=4
#text=I waited until the bus that I needed pulled up and boarded the bus .
#id=5
#text=I paid the bus driver the fare and took a seat .
#id=6
#text=I sat on the bus as it passed by all the stops that we drove past until we reached the stop that I needed .
#id=7
#text=I pulled the bell to alarm the bus driver that I needed to get off at the next stop .
#id=8
#text=He stopped when we arrived and I got off the bus .
#id=9
#text=I had made it my work right on time .
#text=I walked from the bus stop a couple blocks down the street until I reached my job .
#text=Then I entered my work and began working at my job .
